sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function ClientDetails({clientName, clientAddress, admissionDate, dischargeDate, doctorName}) { return ( <>
  • Patient Name: {clientName}
  • Address: {clientAddress}
  • Date Of Admission: {admissionDate.toLocaleDateString()}
  • Date Of Discharge: {dischargeDate}
  • Name of Doctor In-Charge: {doctorName}
) }
